verses.verse: Afterward he brought <S%H935><s%> me to the temple <S%H1964><s%>, and measured <S%H4058><s%> the posts <S%H352><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%> on the one side <S%H6311><s%>, and six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%> on the other side <S%H6311><s%>, which was the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.

And the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> was ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the sides <S%H3802><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> were five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on the one side, and five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on the other side: and he measured <S%H4058><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, forty <S%H705><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: and the breadth <S%H7341><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>. door: or, entrance

Then went <S%H935><s%> he inward <S%H6441><s%>, and measured <S%H4058><s%> the post <S%H352><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the door <S%H6607><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

So he measured <S%H4058><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the breadth <S%H7341><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> unto me, This is the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place.

After he measured <S%H4058><s%> the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of every side chamber <S%H6763><s%>, four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, round about <S%H5439><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>.

And the side <S%H6763><s%> chambers <S%H6763><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%>, one over another <S%H6763><s%>, and thirty <S%H7970><s%> in order <S%H6471><s%>; and they entered <S%H935><s%> into the wall <S%H7023><s%> which was of the house <S%H1004><s%> for the side chambers <S%H6763><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, that they might have hold <S%H270><s%>, but they had not hold <S%H270><s%> in the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>. one: Heb. side chamber over side chamber thirty: or, three and thirty times, or, foot have hold: Heb. be holden

And there was an enlarging <S%H7337><s%>, and a winding about <S%H5437><s%> still upward <S%H4605><s%> to the side chambers <S%H6763><s%>: for the winding about <S%H4141><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> went still upward <S%H4605><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>: therefore the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> was still upward <S%H4605><s%>, and so increased <S%H5927><s%> from the lowest <S%H8481><s%> chamber to the highest <S%H5945><s%> by the midst <S%H8484><s%>. there: Heb. it was made broader, and went round

I saw <S%H7200><s%> also the height <S%H1363><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>: the foundations <S%H4328><s%> of the side chambers <S%H6763><s%> were a full <S%H4393><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> of six <S%H8337><s%> great <S%H679><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

The thickness <S%H7341><s%> of the wall <S%H7023><s%>, which was for the side chamber <S%H6763><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>, was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: and that which was left <S%H3240><s%> was the place <S%H1004><s%> of the side chambers <S%H6763><s%> that were within <S%H1004><s%>.
And between the chambers <S%H3957><s%> was the wideness <S%H7341><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>.

And the doors <S%H6607><s%> of the side chambers <S%H6763><s%> were toward the place that was left <S%H3240><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> door <S%H6607><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%>, and another <S%H259><s%> door <S%H6607><s%> toward the south <S%H1864><s%>: and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> that was left <S%H3240><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Now the building <S%H1146><s%> that was before <S%H6440><s%> the separate place <S%H1508><s%> at the end <S%H6285><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> was seventy <S%H7657><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>; and the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the building <S%H1146><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> thick <S%H7341><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and the length <S%H753><s%> thereof ninety <S%H8673><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

So he measured <S%H4058><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%>; and the separate place <S%H1508><s%>, and the building <S%H1140><s%>, with the walls <S%H7023><s%> thereof, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%>;

Also the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the face <S%H6440><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and of the separate place <S%H1508><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And he measured <S%H4058><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> of the building <S%H1146><s%> over against <S%H6440><s%> the separate place <S%H1508><s%> which was behind <S%H310><s%> it, and the galleries <S%H862><s%> thereof on the one side and on the other side, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, with the inner <S%H6442><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>, and the porches <S%H197><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>; galleries: or, several walks, or, walks with pillars

The door posts <S%H5592><s%>, and the narrow <S%H331><s%> windows <S%H2474><s%>, and the galleries <S%H862><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> on their three stories <S%H7969><s%>, over against <S%H5048><s%> the door <S%H5592><s%>, cieled <S%H7824><s%> with wood <S%H6086><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and from the ground <S%H776><s%> up to the windows <S%H2474><s%>, and the windows <S%H2474><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%>; cieled: Heb. cieling of wood and from: or, and the ground unto the windows

To that above the door <S%H6607><s%>, even unto the inner <S%H6442><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and without <S%H2351><s%>, and by all the wall <S%H7023><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> within <S%H6442><s%> and without <S%H2435><s%>, by measure <S%H4060><s%>. measure: Heb. measures

And it was made <S%H6213><s%> with cherubims <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%>, so that a palm tree <S%H8561><s%> was between a cherub <S%H3742><s%> and a cherub <S%H3742><s%>; and every cherub <S%H3742><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%>;

So that the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> was toward the palm tree <S%H8561><s%> on the one side, and the face <S%H6440><s%> of a young lion <S%H3715><s%> toward the palm tree <S%H8561><s%> on the other side: it was made <S%H6213><s%> through all the house <S%H1004><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
From the ground <S%H776><s%> unto above the door <S%H6607><s%> were cherubims <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> made <S%H6213><s%>, and on the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the temple <S%H1964><s%>.

The posts <S%H4201><s%> of the temple <S%H1964><s%> were squared <S%H7251><s%>, and the face <S%H6440><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>; the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the one as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the other. posts: Heb. post

The altar <S%H4196><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> was three <S%H7969><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high <S%H1364><s%>, and the length <S%H753><s%> thereof two <S%H8147><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the corners <S%H4740><s%> thereof, and the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and the walls <S%H7023><s%> thereof, were of wood <S%H6086><s%>: and he said <S%H1696><s%> unto me, This is the table <S%H7979><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
And the temple <S%H1964><s%> and the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> doors <S%H1817><s%>.

And the doors <S%H1817><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> leaves <S%H1817><s%> apiece, two <S%H8147><s%> turning <S%H4142><s%> leaves <S%H1817><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> leaves for the one <S%H259><s%> door <S%H1817><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> leaves <S%H1817><s%> for the other <S%H312><s%> door.

And there were made <S%H6213><s%> on them, on the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the temple <S%H1964><s%>, cherubims <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%>, like as were made <S%H6213><s%> upon the walls <S%H7023><s%>; and there were thick <S%H5646><s%> planks <S%H6086><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>.

And there were narrow <S%H331><s%> windows <S%H2474><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> on the one side and on the other side, on the sides <S%H3802><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%>, and upon the side chambers <S%H6763><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and thick planks <S%H5646><s%>.
